items.name: Loadshift (Freelancer.com)
items.introduction: Australia's largest freight marketplace platform, connecting shippers with transport providers across the country. Part of the global Freelancer.com network, enabling seamless freight booking and providing data-driven logistics solutions.
items.responsibilities: I am responsible for product strategy and roadmap, driving AI-powered matching between shippers and carriers, designing the membership model, and managing enterprise client solutions to grow platform GMV.

items.name: Alibaba
items.introduction: A comprehensive global e-commerce platform that connects buyers and sellers from all corners of the world. It serves as a hub for a vast array of products and services, enabling seamless transactions and providing a user-friendly experience.
items.responsibilities: I was responsible for after-sales service products in the e-commerce department, including chatbots, customer service workstations, and logistics service automation.

items.name: eBanma-Alibaba Cloud
items.introduction: An intelligent driving solutions company under Alibaba Group, providing solutions such as autonomous driving and smart cockpits for enterprises.
items.responsibilities: I was primarily responsible for In-Vehicle Citylife Service Cloud Application and In-Vehicle AI Voice Assistant.
